response.overview: A spectacular look at the Cavalia experience and the artists - captured live, up front and center. A close up view of the brilliant demonstration of harmony between horse and man displayed by equestrian directors and the magnificent four-legged artists of Cavalia.  Plus, an inside look at the soul of Cavalia. A profile of the creative minds behind Cavalia along with a backstage tour to see the artists and what is takes to make it all happen, day after day.
response.title: Cavalia
